# postmybuild

Generate AI-ready social media prompts for your projects directly from the terminal.

## What is postmybuild?

postmybuild is a CLI tool that helps developers quickly generate prompts for AI tools (like ChatGPT or Gemini) to create posts about their projects on LinkedIn, X (Twitter), or Instagram. It scans your projectâ€™s `package.json` and README (if available) and generates a concise prompt thatâ€™s automatically copied to your clipboard.

## demo video
https://youtu.be/NTzCwhij93g

## Features

- Scan your project automatically for:
  - Project name
  - Description
  - Tech stack
  - README snippet (first ~500 characters)
- Generate platform-specific prompts:
  - LinkedIn âœ…
  - X / Twitter âœ…
  - Instagram âœ…
- Copy prompt directly to clipboard for immediate use in your preferred AI tool
- No API keys required, works offline

## Installation

```bash
npm install -g postmybuild
```

# Usage
Run the CLI in your project folder:

```bash
postmybuild --linkedin
postmybuild --x
postmybuild --instagram
```

# Steps
Navigate to your project folder:
```bash
cd my-project
```

# Run postmybuild with your desired platform:
```bash
postmybuild --linkedin
Enter a short description of the problem your project solves when prompted.
```

Your AI-ready prompt will be automatically copied to the clipboard. Paste it into ChatGPT, Gemini, or your AI of choice to generate your post.

## Example
```bash
$ postmybuild --linkedin
ðŸ§  In one line, what problem does this project solve?
> Helps developers generate AI prompts for social media posts
```

âœ… Prompt copied to clipboard! Paste it into ChatGPT or Gemini to generate your post.

## Tech Stack
Node.js
commander
clipboardy

## Why postmybuild?
Creating social media posts about your projects is time-consuming, especially if you want to leverage AI. postmybuild automates the hardest part: writing the right prompt. You focus on your project; the tool prepares the AI prompt for you.
